heading: Sextets.
general-note: Here are entered collections of compositions for six instruments belonging to various families and in various combinations. Collections of compositions not in a specific form or of a specific type for a single combination of six instruments, and individual works, are entered under this heading followed by a parenthetical qualifier with the names of the instruments or the term "unspecified instrument(s).".

Compositions for six bowed stringed instruments are entered under. String sextets;. for six wind instruments under. Wind sextets;. for six brass instruments under. Brass sextets;. for six woodwind instruments under. Woodwind sextets;. and for six plucked stringed instruments under. Plucked instrument sextets..
Compositions for six percussionists are entered under. Percussion ensembles..
Compositions for six solo voices are entered under. Sacred vocal sextets. or. Vocal sextets..
